comment: Briggs was such a nice lady who really helped everyone out with the projects. She knows we don't want to be doing this and made it as painless as possible. Also I was able to finish my project early and didn't have to go to class for the second half of the semester.

Prof Briggs is one of the nicest and most engaging professors I've ever had. Even though it was an online course, I learned a lot and she helped me improve my writing. She gives detailed feedback and goes above and beyond for each student. As long as you put in the effort, you will get good grades! Take her if you can!! 10/10

Professor Briggs is AMAZING!! Take this Class! I would definitely take it again. Just make sure you turn in your assignments and you will be able to do good. Professor Briggs gives good feedback too! This class has helped me improve my writing skills and made writing enjoyable. 
Currently taking ENGL 1102 with Professor Briggs!
She's very sweet. The research project was straightforward to handle. Most of the work follows up on the project.

She is an absolute Gem. If you need to take ENGL 1102, take her. You spend an entire semester working on 1 research project that is actually fun (you get to choose from a bunch of topics). The workload is spread throughout the semester so you will never really be stressed. Her grading criteria is super clear and she gives great feedback.

She is the sweetest ever. Just imagine that one high school ELA teacher that was loved by every student. She is super caring and will answer every single question. There's one big research project but she will set you up for success. Just put in the effort every week and you will be okay. Go to her office hours if needed. She is so nice, take her.
I LOVE this professor, i wish i could've taken her course for 1102. She gives very great feedback and is incredibly understanding. She tries to make every assignment and lecture fun.
The sweetest professor ever. She was so patient and clear about her grading criteria. Definitely would take it again.

If i could retake this class a million times i would. Her D2L page was very organized and our instructions were laid out very clearly.There were only three essays the entire semester and the weekly assignments were fairly simple. She also responded back to emails fairly quickly. You can tell she really cares for heer students and their success.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I would take Professor Briggs for all english classes. I loved how organized and easy her class was because I'm not that great with english classes but she made it easy fr. Only 3 papers for the semester and a couple baby assignments here and there. She was easy accessible and responded to emails quick.

If you like reading, writing, or need an English credit take this class! Professor Briggs is an amazing professor. You have 2 big essays broken up throughout the semester, 1 group project, and assignments that help with the essays. The structure and assignments in this class have completely transformed the way I write.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Inspirational

comment: Professor Briggs has such a laid-back class and a super easy A. It's clear she cares about her class. You can also reach out to her if you are ever having any issues or questions, but you won't be having any. Also, you have 3 extension requests. Her class is VERY clear and organized so it's very easy to know what you have to do for the week.

Easiest A in the world. Just turn in the work and you'll breeze through this course. Professor Briggs pretty much designed this class so everyone makes it out with an A. This course does not ask much of you. Everything is pretty much a completion grade. You can tell Prof. Briggs loves writing and is very excited about it. Bless her soul fr.

Professor Briggs is amazing! I got 100s on pretty much everything, you'd have to try to get anything less than A honestly. The whole semester is pretty much working on your research project that's broken up into chunks throughout the course. Prof. Briggs is super sweet, and even through an online class, her enthusiasm for writing really shows!

Take this class!! Professor Briggs has this class laid out in a way that is easy to follow and will guarantee you success. I was shocked at how quick she would respond to emails and how thoughtful, caring, and genuine she was. Professor Briggs was amazing at feedback and you can tell she truly cares about her students. I highly recommend this class

Prof. Briggs is the best!! She grades pretty easily and gives amazing feedback on all assignments. She answers emails fast and always wants to make sure everyone understands the guidelines. She gives lots of extra credit, but you don't need it! this class was super easy!!! take her!!!!!!!!

Absolutely loved Professor Briggs as an instructor. She's very understanding and willing to accommodate any special circumstances that may arise. Very responsive to email and clear in her expectations. She also has a very generous allowance policy for late assignments as long as you fill out the relevant form she provides for the semester.

SHE'S THE BEST!!! DON'T TAKE ANY OTHER ENGLISH 1101 TEACHER!!! This class was so easy. She gave me so much feedback and the opportunity to revise for full points. The assignments were pretty interesting and pretty simple. She was very accommodating about due dates and everyone got three extension requests. TAKE HER!!!!
GOATEDDDDD

Taken during the summer but her assignments were straight to the point and did not force students to spend so much time on HW just to makeup for online classes. Clear grading criteria too. Wouldn't hesitate to take her again and everyone whos an incoming freshmen should choose her for either Fall/Spring or summer.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Briggs was one of my favorite professors. In English 1102, you spend all semester building up to a research paper. This paper and presentation is your final. The only other assessments are low stress quizzes and assignments. Participation is key, and she also lets you choose what you do your paper about. Highly recommend you take her!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Take her over anyone else. Her essays are interesting topics so it makes it easier to write and she doesn't make the content hard this is great for anyone incoming as a freshmen with little essay experience. She emails back fast and cares for her students alot. Literally just TAKE HER!

TAKE HER CLASS! Mrs. Briggs is probably the BEST professor I've had. The course material is fairly easy. She has really creative and fun assignments that make writing essays and discussion posts less painful. You do have to read some chapters in the book as there are quizzes over a few, but it's not a lot at all. She is so sweet and caring!
Very sweet professor. Classes are fun and engaging. She's a fair grader overall. I recommend taking her.

She is one of the best college professors you will ever have. I took her hybrid class and only went to class for 45 minutes, 2 days out of the week. She is nice and understanding about any issue you have and if you go to her office hours, you can get almost any grade changed if you have a reason. Her work is easier than the other professors.

Really enjoyed this class, Mrs. Briggs is a very caring professor. We had a lot of group discussions. She has an attendance log, but I wouldn't say that attendance is mandatory. We had one major research paper and worked on it the whole semester. You get to choose your topic and there are so many opportunities to brainstorm and get feedback.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: brings you candy almost every class.

Pretty easy class. I will say the whole class is based around a final paper that she doesn't explain until the end of class. Kind of a lot of homework for and English 1102 class. You have the opportunity to get a lot of bonus points on final paper. She gives great feedback on drafts so it is hard to make a terrible grade on final assignments.

The absolute sweetest professor! It's so obvious that Mrs. Briggs cares about her students. She will go above and beyond to help outside of class and really wants everyone to succeed. There's not an insane load of work in this class and most of it is an easy A. I 10/10 recommend taking her if you can!

Throughout this course there were a few quizzes, some discussions, and 3 essays. She respected that students have lives outside of school and didn't assign much busy work. Gave extra credit on the essays for visiting the writing center. Very easy grader. If you do the work and listen to her feedback, it will be an easy A. Definitely recommend her!

Professor Briggs is such an amazing teacher and person! She is so sweet and really cares about the well-being of her students. She responds to emails fast and gives out pretty easy assignments. Please take her!

Prof. Briggs was an absolute sweetheart. She is very understanding when it comes to her students outside lives. There was in class small assignments that were mostly done with partners, so come to class!! Weekly discussions pertaining to the overall project you will turn in at the end of the semester (the final). Great professor, highly recommend!

If this professor is available, take her. She actually spent the majority of class time focusing on how to write our research paper, no pointless busy work. Only professor I've had that sits down with every single student personally and critiques all of their writing. Gave us multiple project options and a topic that's actually interesting.
She is the absolute best and super understanding, gives you so many opportunities to make up missing work and wants you to succeed, if you have the chance, PLS take her for 1101 and 1102
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: By far my favorite course so far. She made the class fun and I hate reading and writing. She is very confidence boosting with her feedback and gives extremely clear instruction in her rubrics. She is full of energy and really nice to talk to. Would 100% take again!

Prof Briggs is a great professor. The whole objective of her class, at least the semester I took it, was to write a research paper on an outlaw of your choice. She divides the work down into bitesize chunks that are due in a week and its extremely manageable. Her feedback is specific and she gives you plenty of chances to get better.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I would highly recommend taking this teacher. She gives really great feedback on every essay and is a fair grader overall. Easily got an A in her class without having to try much.

Best professor I had for my first semester of college. She truly cares about her students and is willing to help in any situation. The class was easy, just turn your work in on time and try your best. Theres no reason you shouldnt get an A in this class.

LOVED HER! TAKE HER! She actually cares about your well being! Class is fun. Was online but had office hours to help! Only a few quizzes but mainly life skill work like resumes and cover letters. 3 FUN essays! Do the drafts and revise the feedback and you will make an A! Definitely recommend taking her 100%! YOU WONT REGRET IT! Very Understanding.
A great professor! Asynchronous online class, course work given on Monday, due the following Sunday. Very straightforward. The textbook is required, but isn't necessary in my opinion.

If you can take her class, I would highly recommend it! Mrs. Briggs is the sweetest lady. I took her asynchronous online class and it was a breeze 2-3 papers throughout the semester, a few quizzes, and a detective assignment for the final. I thoroughly enjoyed her class and I would gladly take it again.

Literally the best proffesor I've ever had! Show up to class, follow the essay rubrics, and do the weekly inquistive grammers (which are so easy) and you will get an A for sure. She doesn't grade essayss harshly at all. She is the sweetest professor you will ever have!

Professor Briggs is a really good English teacher. She doesnt grade harshly when it comes to essays. Shes easily accessible out of class. Attendance is mandatory and theres a few discussion boards and online assignments but only 3 essays.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: One of my fav professors I have taken. Her guidelines are very clear and she is an easy grader. I enjoyed going to her classes because of how nice and sweet she is. I will definitely take her again when I get the chance. Take her if you can!

Professor Briggs is AMAZING ! There's only three essays and they're based on discussion boards so your essay topic is basically set up for you. She isn't a tough grader at all and essay guidelines are very clear. She also drops the lowest two daily assignments. I recommend the hybrid class if possible. Take Professor Briggs, you won't regret it !

Prof. Briggs is AMAZING! She is the best English teacher I have ever had. She is very helpful and caring. I took the hybrid class, one day a week and the rest was online. She made class time meaningful, and the online work was easy. She offers extra credit that is easy. There's some quizzes and only three essays. Easy A! Take her if you can!
I took her as a hybrid class. Easiest class of my life go to class show you care and youll get an A. If you dont get an A you just didnt even try a little bit.

She is the best teacher I have had so far! I would absolutely take her again if I could. I took her for Engl1101 and 1102. She is so sweet and helpful and really cares for her students and wants them to do well. It is really easy to do well you need to come to class though which is technically good because she teaches you a lot.

You have 3 papers, but they're all easy. One is a personal narrative, one is a rhetorical analysis, and the last is an evaluation, but you have almost free reign on all of them. She's really sweet and lets you take things in your own direction, and encourages creativity. Her feedback is AMAZING, and she is so caring. Very easy course!

This lady is the sweetest woman ever. She really invests in her students and cares about what you have to say. Her course is pretty easy as long as you do your work. Attendance also is not mandatory but go anyway honestly just for fun. I took this class as a hybrid but I wish I had more time with this professor because of how awesome she is.

Please take her! She is so sweet and understanding and knows how to relate to you. There are three papers and a few quizzes at the beginning of the semester, which you have to read the textbook online. The papers are not that hard; it's just putting the effort and making it your own (I'd recommend Grammarly to help). She makes class fun!
Mrs. Briggs was my favorite professor this past semester. She is kind, helpful, and lenient with grading. There are only three essays throughout the course (with very clear guidelines) and no final.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Would not recommend. She doesn't teach. Everyone in the class is assigned a chapter of a book to teach to the class and these presentations take up 70% of class time. The rest of class is working on pointless busy work that really makes you question why you're even taking the class. She doesn't give good feedback.

TAKE HER!!! Easiest A I've ever made and she is the sweetest teacher ever! Super understanding and doesn't give a lot of homework at all! If you can right a paper then you will get an A! Best teacher ever
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Briggs is the sweetest professor, and she grades essays very fairly. Also, she is very understanding and allows students to miss 5 classes. She lets you to make up work on days you missed whether the absence is excused or unexcused. If you get the chance, take her class!

I loved her so much. There will be 4 papers with very clear guidelines that are pretty easy if you meet the instructions she gives you. We didn't do anything hard in class and has inquizitive grammar lessons about once a week that were such and easy grade. She was super sweet and I cant wait to take her 1102 ENGL class this semester? (no final)

Professor Briggs was an amazing professor, she is so sweet and caring. You will need to use the book to takes notes for a grade, but it's not difficult. You have three papers, and some homework but overall it's a very easy A and I would recommend that everyone take her. I enjoyed having her as a professor and she taught me stuff that changed me.

I took her ENGL 1101 class and will take her again for 1102 for sure. We had to write 3 papers (Personal Literacy Narrative, Rhetorical Analysis and an Evaluation Essay). She is very clear on what she wants and open to questions. She has several exercises that prepare us for the essays and will sometimes give us time during class to work on them.

Ms. Briggs was my favorite professor this semester. Her workload isn't heavy at all and she focuses on information that is both useful and entertaining. There are several extra credit opportunities with no final! One of the best English professor at Kennesaw State.

Attendance is required but it shouldnt be, a lot of her classes we all just sit on our phones. But her assignments are very easy to interpret and gives you plenty of time to work on essays and all of her work in general.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback

comment: take her! she cares about her students and makes class really easy. go to class everyday and you get 2 extra points on your final grade. you have to read and write in a journal, but you can just bull crap them lol
Great professor! Does not assign a lot of papers, clear guidelines and not a tough grader. Very kind to all her students.
I LOVE her. The online quizzes are easy, and she's very clear with what she expects on the essays.
Very understanding professor, she makes learning fun and is very interactive. 10/10 recommend taking one of her classes.
She was a very cool professor, brought drinks and snacks for the class occasionally and would often let us out early. The essay criteria is very clear and she's a very easy grader.

10/10 would recommend this professor for any of your classes. She is extremely caring and enjoyable to talk to. She gives really good feedback and basically never gives below an A on an assignment (unless you just don't try). Only three papers, only 1000-1100 words each with online discussions and peer review to help write/revise your essays.

A real gem! Lots of writing as expected.  Took as hybrid.  More work than other classes but this helps your grade.  Also offers extra credit assignments if you need them.  Papers are graded tough but fair.  I liked the class would take again
Professor Briggs was awesome! Really nice and grades relatively easy on papers. Had one quiz but that was unusual. No tests. 4 papers and a couple of assignments on D2l. Take her if you can!

TAKE THIS CLASS. Best teacher ever. Gives lots of extra credit, a lot of good feedback on papers, and is very clear on what she wants from you. Ive taken her 1101 and 1102 classes and I have not made anything lower than an A in this class, and im not the best writer. A lot of time in between papers. I repeat, TAKE THIS CLASS.

I absolutely loved being in Mrs. Briggs class. She is very clear about her expectations and will do whatever she can to help you out. However, DO NOT PLAGIARIZE. I made this mistake on my final paper and she will get you. I should have had an easy A, and now i am unsure of my grade. I still recommend her and would take again.

Mrs. Briggs was my favorite teacher my freshman semester of college.  She made the transition a breeze.  Although she is an awesome teacher, I gave up and got bad grades on my last few essays of the semester and ended up getting a D in the class...  You HAVE to turn in the essays and she gives TONS of feedback.
Mrs. Briggs was the sweetest teacher ever and the class is a breeze to pass as long as long as you put a little effort in it. I am taking her Eng 1102 class next semester, and i would recommend her!

Ms. Briggs is an absolutely amazing woman an teacher. She is funny, and although it was her first year teaching I would't have even known it. She is willing to help you with whatever you need, and is very understanding. TAKE HER!

TAKE HER AT ALL COSTS! Mrs. Briggs is one of the best English teachers I have ever had. She is very clear about what she expects from you and is always willing to help. She will help you brainstorm ideas for your papers and review it for you before it is due and give helpful feedback. Only 4 papers and couple small discussions. Bettered my writing!

I have always liked my English and lit teachers but Mrs. Briggs surpasses all of them!  Mrs. Briggs is extremely helpful and really wants to do anything to help you succeed in the class. She does give pop quizzes but as long as you read you will do fine. If you get the chance, try to talk to her out of class or at the end of class. It really helps

Mrs. Briggs is an amazing professor. She is very clear on what she wants you to do and the class is easy. She gives you so many chances to fix your mistakes. She also gives about 3 weeks to write papers. (brainstorm, rough draft, final, a week for each) She is very very nice and I highly recommend taking her if you want to pass English!

Almost always writing a paper in this class, but they aren't too difficult. Instructions are clear and she is more than willing to work with you on them. You have to make sure you come to class for her peer reviews though or you get points off. Her assigned reading is actually helpful when writing papers.
